component.description: Select a curated basket of stocks to invest in a theme or strategy
component.heading: Stock baskets

item.value: A basket of large cap stocks that are usually leaders in their industries and have grown at a steady pace historically.
A diversified basket of stocks from across market capitalisations to give you the safety of large caps along with the growth potential of mid and small - caps
A basket containing stocks that are in the early stages of their growth and have the potential to generate significant long-term returns
Create your own customised basket to give your equity portfolio the desired exposure

item.heading: Advisory basket
item.description: A basket of stocks advised by KIAL which is recommended for people interested in stocks

item.heading: Basket by Anshul Segal of Kotak AMC
item.description: Large companies having stable growth projections available at attractive valuations
